alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 4:46PM EDT until April 01 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northeastern Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 345 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bonifay, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Vernon, Bonifay, Bradford, Wausau, Brock Crossroad, Orange Hill, Ridgetop, Whitehead Crossroads, Gilberts Mill, Five Points, Round Lake, Spring Hollow, Sunny Hills, Poplar Head, Compass Lake, Sylvania and Johnson Crossroads. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
